entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 9.
